title: Gavin Newsom weighs in: After June 17, vaccinated California workers won’t have to wear masks
content:
1. Gavin Newsom weighs in: After June 17, vaccinated California workers won’t have to wear masks  Sacramento Bee
  2. Gavin Newsom gives details on upcoming vaccine verification system  SFGate
  3. Gov. Newsom announces 'California Dream Vacations,' new vaccine incentive  KCRA Sacramento
  4. Raw Video: Gov. Newsom Announces Funding For Tourism Industry, New Vaccine Vacation Incentive  KPIX CBS SF Bay Area
  5. California adds vacation incentive to spur vaccinations  SFGate
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: Gavin Newsom氏の意見 6月17日以降、ワクチンを接種したカリフォルニア州の労働者はマスクを着用する必要がなくなる
加文-纽森重磅出击。6月17日之后，接种疫苗的加州工人将不必戴口罩
